meanings.definition: A dish consisting of melted cheese poured over toast or crackers.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious rarebit for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best rarebit with cheddar cheese.
meanings.sent3: The rarebit was so cheesy, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The golden rarebit looked like a gooey cheese waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling rarebit filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: In Wales, they often serve rarebit for dinner.
meanings.sent2: Have you ever tried traditional Welsh rarebit?
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit asked for a plate of rarebit.
meanings.sent4: The rarebit was as elusive as a rabbit in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the rarebit lingered on my taste buds.
